rules.description: For Visual Studio Code: Emacs key bindings [control+keys] (rev 10)
For Visual Studio Code: Emacs key bindings [option+keys] (rev 5)
For Visual Studio Code: Bash style Emacs key bindings (rev 2)
Pok3r Volume Controls (fn + sdf to Volume down/up/mute)
Pok3r Media Keys (fn + qwe to Previous Title/Play-Pause/Next)
Tmux Prefix Mode [Tab as trigger key]
Tmux Prefix Mode [ Option+; as prefix ]

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 3" to run trigger "yd" in workflow "me.yuez.alfred.workflows.youdao" '

rules.description: Hyper Misc (Check https://github.com/Vonng/Capslock for all details)
